mapper.select: select * from blog_board where boardwriter = #{boardwriter} order by boardbno desc
select * from blog_board where boardbno > 0 order by boardbno desc
mapper.insert: insert into blog_board (boardwriter, boardtitle, boardcontent, boardbno) values (#{boardwriter}, #{boardtitle}, #{boardcontent}, (select nvl(max(boardbno)+1, 1) from blog_board))
mapper.update: update blog_board set boardcontent = #{boardcontent} where boardbno = #{boardbno}
